humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the invasive tumor as 2.5 x 2.3 x 2.0 cm. According to the rules, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm, T3 tumors are more than 5 cm, and T4 tumors are of any size with direct extension to the chest wall or skin. Since the invasive tumor measures 2.5 cm (the largest dimension), the T stage is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the size of the invasive tumor measures 2.5 x 2.3 x 2.0 cm. The T stage for breast cancer is based on the greatest dimension of the tumor. In this case, the greatest dimension is 2.5 cm, which falls within the T2 category (tumor size 2.0-5.0 cm). Therefore, the T stage from this report is T2.
